amendment.description: To provide an additional amount for funding global HIV/AIDS programs.

vote.text: Amendment SA 127 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 127 proposed by Senator Durbin. (consideration: CR S1347-1350; text: CR S1347) To provide an additional amount for funding global HIV/AIDS programs.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 127 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 127 proposed by Senator Durbin.
